verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> that someone <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H1>"Behold,<s%> your father is <S%H2470>sick.<s%>" He <S%H3947>took<s%> with him his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

Someone <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1121>"Behold,<s%> your son <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H3478>you,<s%>" and Israel <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H3427>himself,<s%> and sat on the <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H410>"God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me at <S%H3870>Luz<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and blessed <S%H1288>me,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6509>me,<s%> 'Behold, I will make you fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> and I will make of you a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>'

Now your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> to you into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> are <S%H669>mine;<s%> Ephraim and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> even as <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> will be mine.

Your <S%H4138>issue,<s%> whom you become the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7121>them,<s%> will be yours. They will be called <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H251>brothers<s%> in their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

As for <S%H935>me,<s%> when I came from <S%H6307>Paddan,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H5750>when<s%> there was still <S%H3530>some<s%> <S%H776>distance<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> and I buried <S%H6912>her<s%> there in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath<s%> (the same is <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%>)."
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who are these?"

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> "They are my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> whom <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H559>here.<s%>" He said, "Please bring <S%H3947>them<s%> to <S%H1288>me,<s%> and I will bless them."

Now the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3513>dim<s%> for <S%H2207>age,<s%> so that he <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H7200>see.<s%> He brought them <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H5401>him;<s%> and he kissed <S%H2263>them,<s%> and embraced them.

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> "I <S%H6419>didn't<s%> think I would <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has let me see your seed <S%H2233>also.<s%>"
<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H5973>between<s%> his <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H8147>both,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s left <S%H8040>hand,<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and brought them near to <S%H5066>him.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it on <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>'s <S%H7218>head,<s%> who was the <S%H6810>younger,<s%> and his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> on <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>'s <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H7919>guiding<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H7919>knowingly,<s%> for <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was the <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>

He <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> whom my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> who has <S%H7462>fed<s%> me all my life <S%H5750>long<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%>

the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> me from all <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5288>lads,<s%> and let my <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H7121>named<s%> on <S%H8034>them,<s%> and the name of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> Let them <S%H1711>grow<s%> into a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

When <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7896>laid<s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> it <S%H3415>displeased<s%> <S%H8551>him.<s%> He held up his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H5493>remove<s%> it from <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>'s <S%H7218>head<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>'s <S%H7218>head.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> "Not <S%H1>so,<s%> my father; for this is the <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>"

His <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3985>refused,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3045>know,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> I <S%H3045>know.<s%> He also will become a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he also will be <S%H1431>great.<s%> <S%H199>However,<s%> his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> will be <S%H1431>greater<s%> than <S%H2233>he,<s%> and his seed will become a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>"

He <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "In you will <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>bless,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'God <S%H7760>make<s%> you as <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and as <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>'" He <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H4191>"Behold,<s%> I am dying, but <S%H430>God<s%> will be with <S%H7725>you,<s%> and bring you again to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Moreover I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>portion<s%> above your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> which I <S%H3947>took<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> with my <S%H2719>sword<s%> and with my <S%H7198>bow.<s%>"
